name: ReefAngelController
0:
”Alexa, what is the temperature of Display Tank?”
”Alexa, turn on Skimmer”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this skill, you can get temperature information from your Reef Angel controller as well as control ports on your relay box.
Make sure your controller is cloud connected since all commands are going through our cloud server.
Alexa will pull labels from the portal, so make sure you change them before discovering new devices.
